== Oneiric Alpha 1 Testing report - Jun 06, 2011 ==
=== Summary ===
==== Test Coverage ====
37 contributors have provided 241 results and covered 204 testcases
<<BR>>

* Image Coverage       : 96.08% (49/51)
** Uncovered images: Edubuntu Upgrade
* Mandatory Test Cases : 89.87% (142/158)
* Run Once Test Cases  : 76.08% (35/46)
* Overall              : 86.76% (177/204)
        
==== Failures summary ====
39 bugs have been reported affecting a total of 59 test cases.                
<<BR>>22 Tests failed.
* Failure Rate: 10.78% (22/204)
<<BR>>
'''Bug Tasks Importance'''
* Critical  	: 2 
* High      	: 12 (4 closed)
* Medium    	: 11 
* Low       	: 2 
* Undecided 	: 16 (4 closed)

'''Major issues found:'''
* unity-2d crashes:
** <nowiki>[[https://launchpad.net/bugs/791127|791127]]</nowiki>	unity-2d-places crashed with SIGSEGV in QTJSC::Structure::materializePropertyMap()

* Other important issues:
** Desktop:

** Non Desktop:
